definition: to poach (talent, personnel from competitors)/to raid (a competitor for its talent)/Taiwan pr. [wa1 jiao3]
to dig/to excavate/to scoop out

sentences.english: They are already poaching our staff from our branches across the country.
sentences.chinese: 他們現在已經在全國範圍內挖角我們的人才。

sentences.english: Tejera was snapped up by Chelsea as a 16 year-old from Espanyol.
sentences.chinese: 特傑拉是16歲的時候被切爾西從西班牙人挖角來的。
